languages.text: "После передачи вредоносного сигнала Кьява Гамма умолкла. Я воздержусь от отправки запросов на {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g} во избежание повторной атаки. Боюсь, мы исчерпали опции анализа ситуации на расстоянии — дальнейшее выяснение, что происходит, возможно только при сближении или даже высадке на поверхность".

"Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."
languages.original_text: "После передачи вредоносного сигнала Кьява Гамма умолкла. Я воздержусь от отправки запросов на {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g} во избежание повторной атаки. Боюсь, мы исчерпали опции анализа ситуации на расстоянии — дальнейшее выяснение, что происходит, возможно только при сближении или даже высадке на поверхность".

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting he harmful signal. I will refrain from sending inquiries to the Forge World to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

"Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting he harmful signal. I will refrain from sending inquiries to the Forge World to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

"Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the industrial world to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

"Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the industrial world to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

"Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

languages.text: “基亚瓦伽马星发出了那些恶意信号之后，便陷入了静默状态。我不打算继续与那个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}进行通讯，以免再次遭到攻击。恐怕，我们目前没有任何手段进行远程分析，只有接近那颗行星，甚至需要派遣船员前往行星表面，才能获得更多情报。”
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

traits.locale_text: “基亚瓦伽马星发出了那些恶意信号之后，便陷入了静默状态。我不打算继续与那个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}进行通讯，以免再次遭到攻击。恐怕，我们目前没有任何手段进行远程分析，只有接近那颗行星，甚至需要派遣船员前往行星表面，才能获得更多情报。”

languages.text: «Kiava Gamma guarda silencio después de haber transmitido la señal nociva. Me abstendré de enviar preguntas al {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} para evitar un segundo ataque. Me temo que hemos agotado las opciones de análisis remoto. Si queremos más información, tendremos que acercarnos, incluso enviar un equipo a tierra».
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

traits.locale_text: «Kiava Gamma guarda silencio después de haber transmitido la señal nociva. Me abstendré de enviar preguntas al {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} para evitar un segundo ataque. Me temo que hemos agotado las opciones de análisis remoto. Si queremos más información, tendremos que acercarnos, incluso enviar un equipo a tierra».

languages.text: "Kiava Gamma ist nach der Aussendung des schädlichen Signals verstummt. Ich werde davon absehen, Anfragen an die Industriewelt {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}{/g} zu senden, um einen zweiten Angriff zu vermeiden. Ich fürchte, dass wir unsere Möglichkeiten der Fernanalyse ausgeschöpft haben — mehr Informationen können nur durch die Verringerung der Entfernung oder sogar durch die Entsendung eines Außenteams auf die Planetenoberfläche gewonnen werden."
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

languages.text: « Kiava Gamma est devenue silencieuse après la transmission du signal destructeur. Si j'étais vous, je m'abstiendrais de toute tentative de contact avec ce {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} pour éviter une deuxième attaque. Je crains que nous ayons épuisé toutes nos possibilités d'analyse à distance... Nous ne pourrons obtenir d'autres informations qu'en nous approchant davantage de la planète ou en envoyant un groupe de reconnaissance à sa surface. »
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

traits.locale_text: « Kiava Gamma est devenue silencieuse après la transmission du signal destructeur. Si j'étais vous, je m'abstiendrais de toute tentative de contact avec ce {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} pour éviter une deuxième attaque. Je crains que nous ayons épuisé toutes nos possibilités d'analyse à distance... Nous ne pourrons obtenir d'autres informations qu'en nous approchant davantage de la planète ou en envoyant un groupe de reconnaissance à sa surface. »

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマは、悪質な信号を送ってから沈黙しています。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}への信号送信は控えて、次の攻撃を回避しましょう。残念ですが、遠隔分析という選択肢はもうなくなりました。これ以上の情報は、惑星に接近するか、遠征部隊を地上に派遣しないと手に入りません」
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマは、悪質な信号を送ってから沈黙しています。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}への信号送信は控えて、次の攻撃を回避しましょう。残念ですが、遠隔分析という選択肢はもうなくなりました。これ以上の情報は、惑星に接近するか、遠征部隊を地上に派遣しないと手に入りません」

languages.text: "Kiava Gama, zararlı sinyali iletmesinin ardından sessizliğe gömüldü. İkinci bir saldırıdan kaçınmak adına {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünyaya{/g} başka bir sorgu göndermekten kaçınacağım. Korkarım uzaktan analiz seçeneklerimiz tükenmiş durumda, daha fazla bilgiyi yalnızca mesafemizi yakınlaştırarak ve hatta gezegenin yüzeyine bir ekip göndererek elde edebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma went silent after transmitting the harmful signal. I will refrain from sending enquiries to the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} to avoid a second attack. I am afraid we have exhausted our options for remote analysis — more information can only be obtained by closing the distance or even sending an away party to the planet's surface."
